anathema: Dismiss or mock a creature’s grief, separate lovers, torture a creature
edict: Comfort and encourage lovers, help the suffering escape their circumstances in life or in death

<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Naderi (The Lost Maiden)](/Deities.aspx?ID=627)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 5

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Comfort and encourage lovers, help the suffering escape their circumstances in life or in death

**Anathema** Dismiss or mock a creature’s grief, separate lovers, torture a creature

**Area of Concern**
Drowning, romantic tragedy, suicide

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** none

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39)

**Favored Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=358)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=70), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=88), [Sorrow](/Domains.aspx?ID=117), [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=98)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=1678)

- **3rd**
[Veil of Privacy](/Spells.aspx?ID=1739)

- **8th**
[Dream Council](/Spells.aspx?ID=1988)

</column>
name: Naderi (The Lost Maiden)
